messages.title: This election is your chance to stop Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
issues.economy: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.

contactInformation.address: Kay Kirkham on behalf of Caroline Jones, (Liberal Democrats), both at 3 Gateways, Harden BD16 1TG

endorsements.endorsement: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

quotes.text: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
